summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of DomainPBN website. All core functionalities are working correctly including backend APIs, frontend UI flows, navigation, data fetching, filtering, search, WhatsApp integration, and admin panel.

ui_bugs.issue: Search input element becomes detached from DOM during interaction
Emergent badge overlay prevents clicking the floating WhatsApp button

passed_tests: Backend API endpoints (18/18 tests passed - 100% success rate)
Homepage loading with hero section, packages showcase, PBN preview, blog posts
Packages page with WhatsApp/Telegram order buttons and auto-generated messages
PBN Network page with filters (niche, DR), sorting functionality working correctly
Blog list page with search functionality (minor DOM detachment issue)
Static pages (About, TOS, Privacy) rendering correctly
Admin dashboard with stats display (Total PBN, Packages, Blog, FAQ)
Navigation between all pages working correctly
Mobile responsive design and mobile menu functionality
SEO features - sitemap.xml and robots.txt generation working
WhatsApp CTA integration with proper message generation
All CRUD operations for PBN, Packages, Blog, FAQ, Pages, Settings
Data filtering and sorting on PBN page
Package order buttons with WhatsApp/Telegram integration
